author: Matthew J. Belvedere
title: What to watch today: Dow set to drop after Tuesday's sharp rebound
description: Dow futures point to a sharp decline at Wednesday's open, one day after a strong advance.
content:
BY THE NUMBERS
Dow futures were pointing to a sharp decline at Wednesday's open, with market swings persisting as daily new coronavirus cases in the U.S. continued to slow. The Dow Jones Industrial Average on Tuesday rallied 558 points, or 2.4%. The S&P … [+6082 chars]
